The image was posted by U: S. President Donald Trump on his Twitter account on November 27, 2019, just before 5 a.m.
The image showed Trump: s head edited onto the body of Rocky Balboa, a fictional character played by Sylvester Stallone in the "Rocky" series of movies.
Trump did not include any explanation or: leading to speculation about its meaning and intention.
The image gained significance in Hong Ko: where pro-democracy protesters displayed it during a "Thanksgiving Rally" as a gesture of gratitude for Trump's support of legislation that supports the protesters and sanctions Chinese and Hong Kong officials who violate human rights.
